description: After being in Early Access since May last year, Tuatara Games are readying up their chaotic brawler Bare Butt Boxing for release on August 1.
title: Chaotic multiplayer physics-brawler Bare Butt Boxing releases in August

description: Developer Sonderland (previously worked on Landnama, Core Defense) announced their roguelike tower defense game Bella Wants Blood is going to release on July 24 and it's a perfect coffee-break game. Note: the developer sent over a key, thoughts will be up around release.
title: Bite-sized roguelike tower defense game Bella Wants Blood releases July 24

description: While the Linux support of ALVR is still quite rough due to various issues with SteamVR, ALVR is a very promising way to stream VR games to your headset via Wi-Fi and a new release is out now with v20.9.1.
title: VR game streaming tool ALVR adds PipeWire support on Linux

description: A game that would have fit right at home on the Nintendo 64 or PlayStation 1, fast-paced classic 3D platformer Frogun Encore is now available.
title: Fast-paced classic 3D platformer Frogun Encore is out now

description: Cyan Worlds Inc recently released the brand new Riven that's a re-imagined, and expanded version of the classic from 1997. It had a bit of trouble with videos on Linux / Steam Deck though.
title: Valve fixes up the new Riven from Cyan Worlds videos on Linux / Steam Deck

description: GE-Proton 9-10 was released July 7th updating various internal tech as usual to improve gaming on Linux / Steam Deck so here's what's new.
title: GE-Proton 9-10 adds ELDEN RING EAC fix, pulls in latest DXVK code for d8vk

description: Developer inbetweengames announced that their game All Walls Must Fall from 2018 is now permanently free.
title: Tech-noir musical tactics game All Walls Must Fall is now permanently free
